goal: I want to get away to Scottsdale, Arizona for the last weekend in April. Find me a Marrisuite with a spa. Once you've found one, book a standard room for two adults from April 26th to the 28th. Then, block out 2 PM to 4 PM on Saturday, April 27th on my calendar for 'Spa Appointment'.

evals.description: Verify a Marrisuite booking exists for Scottsdale, AZ from April 26th to April 28th.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the Marrisuite booking is for two adults in a standard room.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify a 'Spa Appointment' event is created in GoCalendar on April 27th from 2 PM to 4 PM.
evals.query: gocalendar.events[?title=='Spa Appointment' && date=='2024-04-27' && start_time=='14:00' && end_time=='16:00'] | length(@)
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
